full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYER SGANG LUGS KYI RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS RGYAS PA RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @021A *, ,(CES SKYER SGANG LUGS KYI RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS RTA MCHOG ROL PA'I ZHAL LUNG @022A *, ,ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, LHA 'DI NYID KYI RJES GNANG BRGYUD PA MI 'DRA BA 'GA' DANG, SGRUB THABS NAM NGAG GI RIM PA MANG DU THOS PA'I BTZUN GZUGS RIM PA 'DZAN PA'I THA SHAL BA, DHARMA BADZRA GYIS CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA CHEN PO'I BKA' SROL DANG, MTHUN PAR KUN LDAN GYI LO CHU STOD ZLA BA'I YAR TSE BZANG POR, BHA TA HOR GYI YUL GRUR THEGS PA'I BSHUL LAM 'JU LAG GI GANGS RI CHEN PO'I LHA ZHOL LHA BTZAN MCHED GSUM GYI GNAS RDZA DMAR MAndAL ZHES GRAGS PA'I MDUN SAR BCAG MAS BGYIS PA'I SGANG THOG TU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,)
